title: NBN vaults Australia into global top-10 … DDoS attack sources
content:
Or not, if you look at the numbers Australia has won the dubious honour of being named in the global top-10 DDoS sources, and in its quarterly State of the Internet report, Akamai reckons our tiny number of high-speed fibre broadband users are the cause.… via The Register - Networks
http://ift.tt/1XnkSif
